column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I got a Diet Coke and my buddies ordered a glass of cabernet. I tried a sip and it was good cabby.  We ordered a Malnati classic with the sausage and cheese.  We also ordered an appetizer
column2: but it didn't come out until we were done with the pizza
column3: so they took it back at no charge. We were so full after the 2 slices of 'za
